General.Name: Shenzhen Urban Transport Planning Center Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Urban Transport Planning Center Co., Ltd. provides urban transport solutions. It offers urban and rural planning, engineering consulting, engineering design, and information technology operation and maintenance services. The company provides big data analysis and decision support, strategic policy and planning, city and transportation special planning, detailed planning and engineering design, smart operation and maintenance management, and system integration construction services. It covers transportation planning, urban planning and construction, engineering design, landscape gardening, system integration, software development, and other categories. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
